fields.value:
blargbot is equipped with numerous commands, all of which are documented and categorized for your convenience.
[Command List](https://blargbot.xyz/commands/)
fields.name: Commands

fields.value:
blargbot has a comprehensive tag system for making your own complex commands.
[Tag Documentation](https://blargbot.xyz/tags/)
fields.name: Tags

fields.value:
Every command can be fitted with custom role and permission requirements to give you complete control over all features.
[Editcommand](https://blargbot.xyz/commands/#editcommand)
fields.name: Customization

fields.value:
blargbot has a built-in modlogging system, as well as commands to ban, unban, kick, mute, and unmute rowdy users. It also keeps extensive logs about user messages, which are available to you upon command.
[Modlogging](https://blargbot.xyz/commands/#modlog)
fields.name: Moderation

fields.value:
blargbot is completely open-source under the GNU AGPLv3 License. Feel free to take a look and learn how everything works. If you use any of my code in your own project, you are required to credit me. See the license for more details.
[Source](https://github.com/blargbot/blargbot/)
[License](https://github.com/blargbot/blargbot/blob/master/LICENSE.MD)
fields.name: Open-Source

fields.value:
Have a suggestion for the bot? I would be glad to hear it! Found a bug? I'd like to hear that too! You can suggest anything to me using the `suggest` command, by joining my guild, or by submitting a ticket.
[Blargbot Support Guild Invite](https://discord.gg/015GVxZxI8rtlJgXF)
[Submit a Ticket](https://github.com/blargbot/blargbot/issues)
fields.name: Open To Suggestions

description:
blargbot is multipurpose discord bot. Coded in node.js using Eris, blargbot hopes to bring commands and services to your guild.
https://blargbot.xyz
